headline: CenterPoint unveils $65 billion capital spending plan over next 10 years
summary: Data centers dedicated to artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency, as well as the electrification of industries such as transportation, are driving up U.S. power consumption.  CenterPoint also raised its annual adjusted earnings per share forecast to between $1.75 and $1.77 per share, from $1.74 to $1.76 per share earlier.  The U.S. electric and gas utility also expects 2026 adjusted EPS targeting at least the midpoint of the range of $1.89 to $1.91 per share.

content.title: CenterPoint unveils $65 billion capital spending plan over next 10 years

The U.S. electric and gas utility also expects 2026 adjusted EPS targeting at least the midpoint of the range of $1.89 to $1.91 per share.

thumbnail.caption: The headquarters of natural gas and power utility CenterPoint Energy is seen in Houston

headline: CenterPoint Energy Announces Record 10-Year Plan to Invest $65 Billion for the Benefit of Customers; Raises Full Year 2025 Non-GAAP EPS Guidance, Initiates 2026 Full Year Non-GAAP EPS Guidance, and Increases and Extends Long-term Guidance
summary: HOUSTON, September 29, 2025--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today announced a transformative 10-year plan aimed at advancing economic growth, enhancing the experience of customers, and delivering consistent value to all stakeholders across the jurisdictions it serves.

content.title: CenterPoint Energy Announces Record 10-Year Plan to Invest $65 Billion for the Benefit of Customers; Raises Full Year 2025 Non-GAAP EPS Guidance, Initiates 2026 Full Year Non-GAAP EPS Guidance, and Increases and Extends Long-term Guidance
content.summary: HOUSTON, September 29, 2025--CenterPoint Energy, Inc. (NYSE: CNP) or "CenterPoint" today announced a transformative 10-year plan aimed at advancing economic growth, enhancing the experience of customers, and delivering consistent value to all stakeholders across the jurisdictions it serves.
